title: Chrome ‘Lite Mode’ for Android will be removed next month with the Chrome 100 update
content:
Google has announced that, with its upcoming Chrome 100 release, the company will discontinue the “Chrome Lite Mode” feature that has been available on Android for years.

more…

The post Chrome ‘Lite Mode’ for Android will be removed next month with the Chrome 100 update appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has confirmed that it will drop support for "Lite Mode" on Chrome for Android alongside the upcoming Chrome 100 update.
